Class WordFrequencies

  • java.lang.Object
    • WordFrequencies
  • public class WordFrequencies
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is perofrming the main functions It will read count the words. It will display the outputs in file Its methods will be called from GUI main method

    • Method Detail

      • countFrequency

        public java.lang.String countFrequency​(java.lang.String inputFileName,
                                       java.lang.String outputFileName)
        This method is counting the occurences of the words in the file
        Parameters:
        inputFileName - is the name of the input file from which the words to be read
        outputFileName - is the name of the output file in which the data to be stored as a result
        Returns:
        It will return a string that will contain the success or error message

      • insertWord

        public void insertWord​(java.lang.String w)
        Insert the word w into the array of words, unless it already appears there. If the word already appears in the list, add 1 to the counter for that word. The words in the array are in lower case, and w is converted to lower case before it is processed. Note that the words in the array are kept in alphabetical order. If the array has no more space to hold w, then it is doubled in size.
        Parameters:
        It - will take the word as argument to add in the list

      • getWord

        public static WordData getWord​(java.lang.String wo)
        Parameters:
        This - will take the word as string that is to be find in the word frequencies array
        Returns:
        This method will return the word if its already in the word frequencies list otherwise null
